skdetail:

Invocation Name: avalon home
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With Avalon Home skill you can control your Avalon Smart Home hub. Avalon Smart Home solutions enable you to control your lights, thermostats, smart outlets and etc. 
To use this skill, first you need to have Avalon hub installed on your home then download and install Avalon App (on Android).
To enable the skill, you need to get the permission from Avalon App to use the the cloud and remote functionalities of Avalon solutions.

Turn on / off
To turn on / off a light or something either, use its name. 
- Alexa, ask Avalon home to turn on kitchen light

Scenario Activation / Deactivation
- Alexa, ask Avalon home to activate morning
- Alexa, ask Avalon home to deactivate morning

Thermostat
- Alexa, ask Avalon home to set the temperature of bedroom thermostat to 22
- Alexa, ask Avalon home to set mode of bedroom thermostat to cool (heat or fan)
- Alexa, ask Avalon home to increase / decrease the temperature of bedroom thermostat by 2

Dimmer 
- Alexa, ask Avalon home to set level of bedroom dimmer to 1 (1-5)

Shade 
- Alexa, ask Avalon home to open bedroom shade
- Alexa, ask Avalon home to close bedroom shade

Checking state of lights
- what is the state of kitchen light
